name: Web Gallery Project
summary: Learn about .WGP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Web Gallery may be published using XHTML, PHP, or JavaScript, which are all generated by Web Gallery.

description: Web gallery created with WebHat Web Gallery software; can be published to the Web with a custom template or "scheme;" may also include special image effects, such as borders, shadows, and other filters.
